tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE product_recalls (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR,
    recall_reason VARCHAR,
    recall_date DATE,
    recall_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE recall_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  recall_id INT,
  location_id INT,
  recall_date DATE,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE product_recall_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    reason TEXT,
    recall_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE recall_contacts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contact_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(20),
    contact_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE recall_locations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    location_address TEXT,
    contact_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contact_id) REFERENCES recall_contacts(id)
)

CREATE TABLE recall_impacts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    impact_type VARCHAR(50),
    impact_description TEXT,
    estimated_impact INT
)

CREATE TABLE recall_history_archive (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    recall_id INT,
    archived_date DATE,
    archive_reason TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (recall_id) REFERENCES product_recall_history(id)
)
